name: OpenXcell
tagline: A Leading Mobile App Development Company
description:
OpenXcell is a leading mobile app development company in United States and India. Our outsourcing model "Valueshore" is bringing enhanced value to customers who want a better return on their investment.
Major factors of our ValueShore model areQuality, Speed, Responsiveness, Cost Effective, Risk Elemination, Scalable, Consistent and Value Addition.
 
 
 
OpenXcell has designed & developed more than 700 software & mobile apps, visit portfolio.
 
 
 
We provide solutions like :
 
Mobile App Design & Development
Custom Software Development
Web Application Development
Scalable eCommerce & Retail 
Website / Branding / Conversion Optimization
Enterprise Content Management System
Cloud Deployment & Maintenance
Quality Assurance & testing
Staff Augmentation / Offshore Dedicated Team
READ MORE...

locations.address: 202-203, Baleshwar Avenue, Opp. Rajpath Club, S.G Highway
